atk-abh03a35:2_2: Tattha “ānantariyavatthūni nāma garūni bhāriyāni, tasmā asañciccāpi tesu vatthūsu vikopitesu ānantariko hotī”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi ekaccānaṁ uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a35:2_3: te sandhāya asañciccāti pucchā sakavādissa, laddhivasena paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:2_5: Yadi ca asañcicca kammapathabhedo siyā, avasesā pāṇātipātādayopi asañcicca bhaveyyu”nti codanatthaṁ asañciccapāṇaṁ hantvātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:2_8: Na vattabbaṁ mātughātakoti pucchā paravādissa, rogapaṭikārādikāle asañcicca ghātaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_9: Nanu mātā jīvitā voropitāti pañhepi asañcicca voropitaṁ sandhāya paṭiññā sakavādisseva.
atk-abh03a35:2_10: Evaṁ adhippāyaṁ pana aggahetvā hañcīti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:2_13: Saṅghabhedake pana dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya saṅghabhedo ānantarikoti pucchā sakavādissa, “saṅghaṁ samaggaṁ bhetvāna, kappaṁ nirayamhi paccatī”ti vacanaṁ ayoniso gahetvā paṭiññā paravādissa.
atk-abh03a35:2_14: Puna sabbeti puṭṭho sakapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, parapakkhe dhammasaññiṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a35:2_16: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ ekanteneva dhammavādissa ānantarikabhāvadassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:2_18: Itaro pana adhippāyaṁ aggahetvā laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a35:5_4: Lokiyaṁ samāpattiñāṇampi hoti dānādivasena pavattaṁ kammassakatañāṇampi;
atk-abh03a35:5_6: Imaṁ pana vibhāgaṁ akatvā “saccaparicchedakameva ñāṇaṁ na itaraṁ, tasmā natthi puthujjanassa ñāṇa”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:5_9: yadi tassa ñāṇaṁ natthi, paññādayopi natthi.
atk-abh03a35:5_10: Atha paññādayo atthi, ñāṇampi atthi. Kasmā?
atk-abh03a35:5_14: Dukkhaṁ parijānātīti lokuttaramaggañāṇameva dīpeti, na ca lokuttarameva ñāṇanti.
atk-abh03a35:8_2: Tattha “niraye nerayikakammāneva nirayapālarūpavasena vadhenti, natthi nirayapālā nāma sattā”ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a35:8_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:8_4: Atha naṁ “yadi tattha nirayapālā na siyuṁ, kammakāraṇāpi na bhaveyyuṁ.
atk-abh03a35:8_5: Kāraṇikesu hi sati kāraṇā”ti codetuṁ natthi nirayesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:9_1: Yathā hi manussesu sati kāraṇikesu kāraṇā, evaṁ tatthāpīti ayamettha adhippāyo.
atk-abh03a35:9_2: Atthi nirayesūti pucchā paravādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:9_3: Na vessabhū nopi ca pettirājāti paravādinā sakasamayato suttaṁ ābhataṁ.
atk-abh03a35:9_9: attano kammehi ito paṇunnaṁ paralokaṁ pattaṁ purisaṁ na ete vessabhūādayo hananti.
atk-abh03a35:9_10: Yehi pana so kammehi tattha paṇunno, tāni sakāni kammāniyeva naṁ tattha hanantīti kammassakataṁ dīpeti, na nirayapālānaṁ abhāvaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:9_11: Sakavādinā pana tamenaṁ, bhikkhaveti ābhatāni suttapadāni nītatthānevāti.
atk-abh03a35:12_2: Tattha devesu erāvaṇādayo devaputtā hatthivaṇṇaṁ assavaṇṇaṁ vikubbanti, natthi tattha tiracchānagatā.
atk-abh03a35:12_3: Yesaṁ pana tiracchānavaṇṇino devaputte disvā “atthi devesu tiracchānagatā”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ ;
atk-abh03a35:12_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:12_5: Atha naṁ “yadi devayoniyaṁ tiracchānagatā siyuṁ, tiracchānayoniyampi devā siyu”nti codetuṁ atthi tiracchānagatesūtiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:12_6: Kīṭātiādi yesaṁ so abhāvaṁ icchati, te dassetuṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:12_7: Erāvaṇoti pañhe tassa atthitāya paṭiññā sakavādissa, na tiracchānagatassa.
atk-abh03a35:12_8: Hatthibandhātiādi “yadi tattha hatthiādayo siyuṁ, hatthibandhādayopi siyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:12_10: Kāraṇikāti hatthācariyādayo, yehi te nānāvidhaṁ kāraṇaṁ kareyyuṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_2: Tattha yesaṁ “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti idañceva suttaṁ sammāvācākammantājīvānañca cittavippayuttataṁ nissāya “nippariyāyena pañcaṅgikova maggo”ti laddhi, seyyathāpi mahisāsakānaṁ, te sandhāya pañcaṅgikoti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:15_3: Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṁ, sā ca na maggotiādi parasamayavasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_5: Rūpattā pana maggo na hotīti vaṇṇitā.
atk-abh03a35:15_6: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgantiādi maggaṅgassa amaggatā nāma natthīti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_7: Pubbeva kho panassāti sutte parisuddhasīlassa maggabhāvanā nāma hoti, na itarassāti āgamaniyapaṭipadāya visuddhibhāvadassanatthaṁ “kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī”ti vuttaṁ, na imehi vinā pañcaṅgikabhāvadassanatthaṁ.
atk-abh03a35:15_8: Tenevāha “evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī”ti.
atk-abh03a35:18_2: Tattha dhammacakkappavattane dvādasākārañāṇaṁ sandhāya “dvādasavatthukaṁ ñāṇaṁ lokuttara”nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi pubbaseliyānaṁ, te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a35:18_3: Atha naṁ “sace taṁ dvādasavatthukaṁ, dvādasahi maggañāṇehi bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ dvādasātiādimāha.
atk-abh03a35:18_4: Itaro maggassa ekattaṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati, ekekasmiṁ sacce saccañāṇakiccañāṇakatañāṇānaṁ vasena ñāṇanānattaṁ sandhāya paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a35:18_6: Nanu vuttaṁ bhagavatāti suttaṁ saddhiṁ pubbabhāgaparabhāgehi ñāṇanānattaṁ dīpeti, na ariyamaggassa dvādasa ñāṇataṁ.
